Articles.Content: Hey guys I found this game form a friend posting the demo video on facebook. I love the game. Just bought the 'full' versionhh and I was wondering what was the best ship/ way to get to mun and land?

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Build a multi-stage rocket and use MechJeb.

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
Is MechJeb built into the game? or is it a download. I\'m still downloading the full game.

Is MechJeb built into the game? or is it a download. I\'m still downloading the full game.

nope, check out the plugins, but i suggest getting the hang of stock parts right now

I only use stock parts, I just throw on a MechJeb onto the side of it so that it can get me into orbit. Something I can do, but can\'t seem to make it to the moon with it. So I get into orbit circlize it and then transfer to munar orbit
I recommendation is to try to land on Mun without mod & plug ins. It would be hard, but a great challenge for your skills.

Trydyingtolive makes some amazing tutorials of KSP.

Search him up on Youtube.

Well, with the update of .15 I built and launched a rocket to muns orbit and brought the guys back, and still had enough fuel that i might have been able to bring the ship back to ksc, but left it to land. Thanks for the help, if anyone wants I will post the rocket I used
